title: Connectivism-Based Blended Course for GNSS Educational Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Surveying Techniques and Understanding of GIS Software
context.additional_context: A course focused on developing GNSS competencies immediately applicable in the workplace for practitioners. Integrates theoretical learning with practical activities to holistically enhance scientific attitudes, professional knowledge, and practical skills.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles and applications of GNSS systems and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can develop practical skills to collect, analyze, and visualize field data using various GNSS equipment.
Learners can build a collaborative network with peer learners and experts to foster a sustainable learning environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
